members.name: DEFAULT
members.comment: The OAEP parameter set with all default values.

members.name: getDigestAlgorithm
members.comment: Returns the message digest algorithm name.

members.name: getMGFAlgorithm
members.comment: Returns the mask generation function algorithm name.

return: the mask generation function algorithm name.

members.name: getMGFParameters
members.comment: Returns the parameters for the mask generation function.

return: the parameters for the mask generation function.

members.name: getPSource
members.comment: Returns the source of encoding input P.

return: the source of encoding input P.

members.comment: Constructs a parameter set for OAEP padding as defined in the PKCS #1 standard using the specified message digest algorithm mdName, mask generation function algorithm mgfName, parameters for the mask generation function mgfSpec, and source of the encoding input P pSrc.

param: mdName - the algorithm name for the message digest.
mgfName - the algorithm name for the mask generation function.
mgfSpec - the parameters for the mask generation function. If null is specified, null will be returned by getMGFParameters().
pSrc - the source of the encoding input P.
throws: NullPointerException - if mdName, mgfName, or pSrc is null.

name: javax.crypto.spec.OAEPParameterSpec
